EmailTemplate.name: WBN-202202-EMP-OTH-HWBR-Q2-NATIONAL-BROKER.Invite 2
EmailTemplate.subject: Expert insights in time for Mental Health Awareness Month
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
JOIN US Understanding and bridging gaps in your clients’ mental health care offerings
May 17 | 2 p.m. Eastern
Image Mature woman waving at tablet
In this webinar, we’ll explore existing barriers to mental health care and introduce you to a new mental health care offering that expands access to care through a full spectrum of digital, coaching and clinical support.
Register now <[[https://teladochealth.com/broker-webinar/]]>
Hear from members of your Teladoc team:
Julia Hoffman, PsyD Vice President, Clinical Strategy Behavioral Health Teladoc Health
Pat Sir President, Broker Market Teladoc Health
Jack Diamond Senior Director of Broker Sales Teladoc Health
About Teladoc Health Teladoc Health is empowering all people everywhere to live healthier lives by transforming the healthcare experience. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages clinical expertise, advanced technology and actionable data insights to meet the evolving needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
